p: Regional climate-model simulations exhibit large fractional decreases in maximum winter daily snowfall over much of western Europe, but little change or increases in other parts of Europe that are climatologically colder [ 88]. As in the simple theory and in global climate-model simulations, there is a strong link in regional simulations [ 88] and downscaled global simulations [ 52] between the changes in snowfall extremes and the local climatological temperature in the control climate.
